name: The America Party
description: The America Party ($TAP) is a meme coin born from Elon Musk’s viral poll calling for a new political party to represent the 80% in the middle. A massive 80% voted yes to a new US party. $TAP came to live after this poll and was launched on Ethereum as an ERC-20 token, $TAP has no VCs, no presale, and no leaders—just a global grassroots movement turning frustration into unstoppable, meme-powered change.
